reviews.text: First time coming here and the food is delicious! I had a margarita pizza and my husband had a sausage pizza. Staff was so friendly and made us feels welcomed. Will come here again!

We ordered a cheese pizza, deluxe pizza, pepperoni/sausage/olives pizza, margharita pizza (their spelling), blanca pizza, cheese garlic bread, and an order of mild chicken wings. The best of the bunch was the cheese garlic bread, which unfortunately got stale quickly because of the travel time (15 minutes). None of the pizzas landed with any member of the family. The margharita pizza in particular was deemed unworthy of a second bite. My take is that ingredients are dumped on the pie without a lot of thought. Ingredients don't get cooked the same, like peppers and onions taste closer to raw than cooked. In general, we had a poor experience.

There's enough great reviews that I'm willing to dine in and see how the experience compares, but I definitely won't do takeout again (I'll update my review after my visit). As it stands, I wasn't impressed.

Just wanted to give an honest update here.
The first time I ordered this pizza, I wasn‚Äôt satisfied with the quality ‚Äî but looking back, maybe it was just my perception or an off day.

The truth is, the quality is actually very good. And what really stood out was how the owner handled my feedback ‚Äî he listened, showed genuine concern, and was incredibly respectful and human about it.

I decided to give it another try‚Ä¶ and I was honestly impressed.
I‚Äôve ordered a few more times since then, and each time has been great.

We‚Äôre all human ‚Äî we make mistakes, and that includes me.
So here I am, being fair: I absolutely recommend this place now.
Great pizza, great service, and people who truly care. üçï

Hands down my favorite pizza spot! Their NY Patrol Pizza is our absolute favorite‚Äîso delicious and packed with flavor. Not only do they make amazing pizza, but they also have traditional Brazilian dishes that we love, making it feel like a taste of home. The atmosphere is great, and the service is always friendly. If you‚Äôre looking for the perfect mix of New York-style pizza and Brazilian comfort food, this is the place to go! Highly recommend! üçïüáßüá∑

I used to purchase pizza here. Got a pizza last night. WHAT. THE. HELL. Did you run out of mozzarella?! What was the slapped on slices of cheese?!? White American cheese looks like same so it will be ok?!? Please don‚Äôt ever do this again. Yikes.

editorial_summary.overview: Casual local chain with East Coast-style, thin-crust pizzas, calzones & local brews on tap.

recentReviews.text: Pretty good pizza little pricey but it was worth it in my opinion !
Amazing pasta! The Fettuccine Alfredo was awesome especially with the bread. The owner Leo, is a great guy and makes the whole place feel like home.
First time coming here and the food is delicious! I had a margarita pizza and my husband had a sausage pizza. Staff was so friendly and made us feels welcomed. Will come here again!

Soooo yummy! We ordered the chicken stroganoff and it is SO authentic to the Brazilian taste. Satisfied my Brazilian food craving. P√£o de queijo was also to die for. Laticia served us. She was so nice and attentive! Definitely will be coming back.
Impeccable pizza and with some additions from Brazil like guarana soda and acai fruit desserts, YES please!  My new favorite pizza place, by far.
It was so amazing on all counts. We loved it.

detailedReviews.author: Raul Ramirez
detailedReviews.text: Pretty good pizza little pricey but it was worth it in my opinion !

detailedReviews.author: Op Muh
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pasta! The Fettuccine Alfredo was awesome especially with the bread. The owner Leo, is a great guy and makes the whole place feel like home.

detailedReviews.author: Mind of SamyKat
detailedReviews.text: First time coming here and the food is delicious! I had a margarita pizza and my husband had a sausage pizza. Staff was so friendly and made us feels welcomed. Will come here again!

detailedReviews.author: Parker Whitelock
detailedReviews.text: Soooo yummy! We ordered the chicken stroganoff and it is SO authentic to the Brazilian taste. Satisfied my Brazilian food craving. P√£o de queijo was also to die for. Laticia served us. She was so nice and attentive! Definitely will be coming back.

detailedReviews.author: Ron Barney
detailedReviews.text: Impeccable pizza and with some additions from Brazil like guarana soda and acai fruit desserts, YES please!  My new favorite pizza place, by far.

detailedReviews.author: Gwen Palmer
detailedReviews.text: It was so amazing on all counts. We loved it.

detailedReviews.author: bia badu
detailedReviews.text: Best place to eat an original Brazilian pizza! If you want it don‚Äôt think twice, just go! I love the vibe and the food, Pedro was an amazing server! Nice place for your family!

detailedReviews.author: Valorie A
detailedReviews.text: Very pleasant workers. The downfall was the price.

detailedReviews.author: jay johnson
detailedReviews.text: I stopped by last Friday (8/8/25) for lunch. Ordered a Cheese Calzone. Now I've eaten dozens and dozens of calzones in my life, including in NYC. What I was served was not a calzone, I have no idea what it was. When I cut it open, it vomited a creamy substance, that didn't deserve to be called cheese. It was uneatable. Check please. I'm still mad I actually paid for it because they might take that as an endorsement. Run away, I am not coming back.

detailedReviews.author: Diana Martinez
detailedReviews.text: The place is just absolutely perfect. Prices are good, food is perfect. The only problem that I see if that I never guessed that the place is Brazilian just because of the name and that‚Äôs why I didn‚Äôt come before but now that I know I‚Äôll come very very often.

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Pantages
detailedReviews.text: I used to purchase pizza here. Got a pizza last night. WHAT. THE. HELL. Did you run out of mozzarella?! What was the slapped on slices of cheese?!? White American cheese looks like same so it will be ok?!? Please don‚Äôt ever do this again. Yikes.

detailedReviews.author: Fabrizio Pastene
detailedReviews.text: The picanha sandwich is absolutely delicious! 100% recommended!

detailedReviews.author: Diego Vinicius
detailedReviews.text:
Just wanted to give an honest update here.
The first time I ordered this pizza, I wasn‚Äôt satisfied with the quality ‚Äî but looking back, maybe it was just my perception or an off day.

The truth is, the quality is actually very good. And what really stood out was how the owner handled my feedback ‚Äî he listened, showed genuine concern, and was incredibly respectful and human about it.

I decided to give it another try‚Ä¶ and I was honestly impressed.
I‚Äôve ordered a few more times since then, and each time has been great.

We‚Äôre all human ‚Äî we make mistakes, and that includes me.
So here I am, being fair: I absolutely recommend this place now.
Great pizza, great service, and people who truly care. üçï

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Cazier
detailedReviews.text: I really enjoyed the pizza I ordered, and my husband enjoyed his Reuben (I think that's what he got). My brother was disappointed by his pizza and felt it didn't have enough cheese or flavoring. But our server was very friendly and helpful, and the atmosphere was clean, open, and welcoming.

detailedReviews.author: Trevr Smith
detailedReviews.text: Service was top notch here. Unfortunately the pizza wasn't. Worse than Domino's.

detailedReviews.author: Chantz
detailedReviews.text: Pizza wasn't great but service  was great gave us a free drink on the house

detailedReviews.author: Michele Murphy
detailedReviews.text: Come for the Brazilian pizza. We liked our pizza but the stroganoff was so bad which is hard to believe  because it‚Äôs not something too hard to make. The chicken was so soft but not in a good way. You could tell the quality was poor. Normally I would not leave a review like this but we were so disappointed and I‚Äôm hoping they will choose to use better quality meat. We have had the picanha in the best and that was a lot better too. The service was good though!!

detailedReviews.author: El Fine
detailedReviews.text: Awesome Brazilian style pizza. The name is very misleading.

detailedReviews.author: Pamela Peterson
detailedReviews.text: Changed ownership. Still excellent food, but no longer a foldable NY slice. Ive been a few times since the change and service each time has been just sad.

detailedReviews.author: Riley Peterson
detailedReviews.text:
Slices are too thin. Servers seem unsure about what to do. Replaced coke products for Pepsi. Strange unappealing music.
Pizza was great!

detailedReviews.author: Lauren Peterson
detailedReviews.text: where‚Äôd the big NY style pizza slices go? Why are the slices so small? food is a 10/10 just need my big slice:)

detailedReviews.author: Trelynn G
detailedReviews.text:
Henry was a absolute fantastic server. Very attentive and very good manners. Something that is often lost in service industry.

Food was good. Pizza was delicious. Bolognase sauce should be a bit meatier. Kids meals were good for my picky pallete kids.

Atmosphere is great. Exactly what I wanted after a long and busy day visiting Thanksgiving Pointe with the kids.

detailedReviews.author: Lugaru Kot
detailedReviews.text: Terrible restaurant. A pity about the money spent.

detailedReviews.author: Cory Abeel
detailedReviews.text: We love this place. Great pizza and sandwiches. We come here regularly with our big family and friends.

detailedReviews.author: Kara Hall
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm so disappointed! We come here all the time and the service was not the same this time! We came in waited several minutes to be sat (without even a greeting) and then proceeded to wait almost 30 mins and while we watched several staff just pass by as well as stand in the front talking and doing nothing, nobody came and greeted us to take our order. The cook even looked around the corner and saw that we hadn‚Äôt been greeted. Nothing was done! We walked out while all 4 of the servers stood there and watched while talking. The energy felt very negative in the space. Not sure what was going on and why it‚Äôs gone downhill! Unfortunately, they have lost us as a loyal customer! So sad because we loved this place!

detailedReviews.author: Kyle Hall
detailedReviews.text: We were ignored for 30 minutes after being seated while 4 servers stood in a group gossiping. Fire all 4 and find better staff.

detailedReviews.author: Yaroslav Zaiets
detailedReviews.text: service is very bad and rude. waiting for order 50 minutes

detailedReviews.author: Alex Last Name
detailedReviews.text: The service was really bad, the manager (I think) kept staring at me and my friend the whole time when I was just trying to eat my food. The food was fine, but it was a very uncomfortable setting. We wanted to leave as soon as possible but the food took like 50 minutes with the manager staring at us for all fifty of them. Overall, eat it if your gonna order this expensive mediocre

detailedReviews.author: Suzanne
detailedReviews.text: We had a great experience here. The pizza was delicious, the staff was friendly and attentive and it was exactly the type of dining out experience we were looking for. Good food, good service and very reasonably priced.

detailedReviews.author: Samuel Shrewsbury
detailedReviews.text: Very mid food.  Waited over an hour after ordering.  Waited even longer for them to get the check, and then they automatically put a tip on the bill so you don't even get a choice on how much to tip.

detailedReviews.author: Martha patricia
detailedReviews.text: I came in expecting a good pizza, but what I got was a huge disappointment. There was barely any tomato sauce or cheese ‚Äî the basics were pretty much missing. It‚Äôs obvious they cut corners everywhere, to the point where the pizza didn‚Äôt even smell like pizza. The ‚Äúcatupiry‚Äù clearly wasn‚Äôt the real thing and had no flavor at all. I‚Äôve had pizza from very simple places in Brazil that put way more effort, flavor, and toppings. And to make it worse, not even the box had the name of the place ‚Äî they even saved on that. For me, that‚Äôs it. I‚Äôm never coming back to this place.

detailedReviews.author: attysupply2025
detailedReviews.text: Our experience could have been better. We weren't shown to a table after receiving our menus, and we didn't receive any water refills during our visit. Additionally, our milkshake was forgotten until we reminded the staff. The service was very poor.

detailedReviews.author: Rick Andrus
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is great and the service is very personal.  It‚Äôs obviously not a franchise because it feels family owned and operated.

detailedReviews.author: Dirlei da silva
detailedReviews.text: Comprei picol√© de Goi√°s Goi√¢nia muito gostoso. Quero voltar para experimentar pastel e outras comidas brasileiras.

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Fagundes
detailedReviews.text: Comida saborosa, atendimento gentil

detailedReviews.author: TreaLee Davies
detailedReviews.text: We go here every Monday and always get amazing service. üôÇ

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Young
detailedReviews.text: Delicious. Fair price. Friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Dalton Anderson
detailedReviews.text:
We ordered a cheese pizza, deluxe pizza, pepperoni/sausage/olives pizza, margharita pizza (their spelling), blanca pizza, cheese garlic bread, and an order of mild chicken wings. The best of the bunch was the cheese garlic bread, which unfortunately got stale quickly because of the travel time (15 minutes). None of the pizzas landed with any member of the family. The margharita pizza in particular was deemed unworthy of a second bite. My take is that ingredients are dumped on the pie without a lot of thought. Ingredients don't get cooked the same, like peppers and onions taste closer to raw than cooked. In general, we had a poor experience.

There's enough great reviews that I'm willing to dine in and see how the experience compares, but I definitely won't do takeout again (I'll update my review after my visit). As it stands, I wasn't impressed.

detailedReviews.author: Anderson Rojas
detailedReviews.text: Excelente servicio

detailedReviews.author: Curtis Evans
detailedReviews.text: The food here is amazing. It made me feel like I was back in Brazil eating their authentic Brazilian pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Maria
detailedReviews.text: The atmosphere was so comfortable and mellow. The pizzas were really good and they have this passion fruit mousse that I loved. The service was great!

detailedReviews.author: JEFF B
detailedReviews.text:
Great place for some Brazilian food.  They have two menus,  if you want Brazilian style pizza, they have it.
There feijoada is awesome.  Beef Stroganoff is really good
If you want a great Stromboli this is the place .

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Green
detailedReviews.text:
NY Pizza Patril was great! This was my first time eating here. I was with a friend who was visiting from out of town, and I never make it to that end of the valley, so both of us weren't sure where to eat. We took a chance and weren't disappointed!

If you have kids-I highly recommend letting them make their own pizzas (or even doing this yourself). It was great watching them add the sauce and toppings they chose, then it was baked and brought back for them to eat.

The pizza was really good and the service we had was great!. I highly recommend it!

detailedReviews.author: Extreme Offset Rims
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is great, and I always get really good service, the team is so nice and polite all the time.

detailedReviews.author: Aussie Mik79
detailedReviews.text: Service is good, but their pizza is terrible. Shouldn't have NY in the name. And their stuffed crust is ricotta cheese! Never should happen

detailedReviews.author: Linda Peck
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a diy pizza and it was loaded with all the extra toppings that I requested and the crust was delicious. Great price also! Will be going back again soon!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Fay
detailedReviews.text: I can only relate one experience and one dish, the pepperoni calzone. It was the best I've had, on this side of the Atlantic or the other. Be forewarned this has a Brazilian type of style to the food. Oh, they have some small Brazilian peppers that are to die for.

detailedReviews.author: cristielly prado
detailedReviews.text: Hands down my favorite pizza spot! Their NY Patrol Pizza is our absolute favorite‚Äîso delicious and packed with flavor. Not only do they make amazing pizza, but they also have traditional Brazilian dishes that we love, making it feel like a taste of home. The atmosphere is great, and the service is always friendly. If you‚Äôre looking for the perfect mix of New York-style pizza and Brazilian comfort food, this is the place to go! Highly recommend! üçïüáßüá∑

detailedReviews.author: Carlos Duarte
detailedReviews.text: They serve some pizzas listed as Brazilian style, but not too generous like in Brazil. The tomato sauce is not hand made and calabreza is more like a regular Americam sausage. Finally, don't expect to have much catupiry when you order this ingredient. In Brazil we have catupiry in every bite, but this place just spread a few over the crust.

detailedReviews.author: Kaley McCloskey
detailedReviews.text: Charge you extra without your knowledge.

detailedReviews.author: Kent Palmer
detailedReviews.text: Excellent service!! Thank you!!

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Bianco
detailedReviews.text: We always have a great time. Good Pizza, and the cheesy garlic bread is wonderful. Service was attentive and timely. Food was warm and well cooked. Their servers went above and beyond to male sure our very large party had everything we needed while we celebrated Mom's Bday. Chairs are comfortable and location is good too; just right off the freeway. :) We love the owners and their commitment to high quality. Will continue to be loyal customers.

detailedReviews.author: Hayden
detailedReviews.text: Went here as a quick bite after a long day of work. Ordered 3 items and waited an hour, wasn‚Äôt stoked on that. Lot of people standing around inside not doing anything. Service was mid, food was good. Surprised they haven‚Äôt fixed their obvious issues yet from these reviews. Even though I live only a 1/4 of a mile away and this is the only ‚Äúunique‚Äù pizza shop near me (and I really love pizza), I will not be returning, I‚Äôd rather drive much longer than suffer from what these other reviews have mentioned. Hope they pull it together before they get replaced by a good business.

detailedReviews.author: TIAGO MOURA
detailedReviews.text:
This is the best pizza in Utah, by far !!!
Brazilian dishes so good too, also the pasta !

detailedReviews.author: Eliot Wood
detailedReviews.text: Your pizza and service sucks. I paid 25$ for a medium with the wrong topping on it. A topping I was forced to add btw since the system didn't accept that my order wasn't above $20. When I said it in the store at pickup there was no offer to make another pizza with what I thought I ordered. No napkins or spice/cheese packets in the box to go along with the pizza. And the chicken added was diced and from frozen, not actual fresh chicken. It's no wonder your store is not busy

detailedReviews.author: Michael Kevorkian
detailedReviews.text: The best east coast style pizza in Utah.

detailedReviews.author: Nathan T
detailedReviews.text: I found this place a week ago and have literally eaten here every day (except Sunday) since.  I‚Äôve gotten their cheese pizza, pepperoni pizza, and meatball pizza. I‚Äôve also had their lasagna, spaghetti with meatballs, and chicken parmigiana. Every single dish has been amazing! The portion sizes are huge and I‚Äôve loved every single thing I‚Äôve gotten. My favorite thing about this place is they have so many different options. From pizza, to sandwiches, to freaking ribs! This place is incredible. Oh also, the staff are always super nice. Gabriel is the man!

detailedReviews.author: Dave mcleod
detailedReviews.text: I spent 7 months working in Queens, NY, and would get take-out from 2 local pizza spots. I ordered a pizza from here to take back to my hotel, I must say it was unreal!!! Pizza was very similar to back in NY, which I have truly missed. Service was great, and their posted pick-up time was spot on, and I was greeted right away. I will be ordering again my last week here. I travel for work 90% of the year, and this pizza truly matches up with some of the best!

detailedReviews.author: Olivia Ono
detailedReviews.text: I really love this place. The people that work here are so nice. And the food is always tasty. There‚Äôs a huge menu of options. I love that there is a gluten free crust too.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Hyland
detailedReviews.text: Wow, yum! I was pleasantly surprised! If you‚Äôve never had Brazil‚Äôs version of pizza you should and this is the place to do it in! They are definitely more Italian than your average American pizza with lots of yummy options and new things to try! Customer service was phenomenal. I only took a star away for the atmosphere. It was super laid back like an American pizza joint but this place deserves better in my opinion. I‚Äôd prefer it to be just a bit nicer to match the quality of the food but that‚Äôs just my personal preference.

detailedReviews.author: Makenna Morales
detailedReviews.text: Service was great and fast, and very friendly staff. The pizza was really good and as close to authentic New York pizza you can hope for it Utah! The crust was thin and crispy and folded in half the way you want with NY style pizza. Would definitely recommend this place for some great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Zaerr
detailedReviews.text: This wasn‚Äôt their mandatory 18% tip for party size.  It was a single item togo order. Looked at my credit card statement to see they added a tip to my receipt that I did not authorize. I have a photo of my receipt as I left it. It was a small amount but I won‚Äôt ever be coming back. This is not how to do business. You have dishonest cashiers.

detailedReviews.author: Jason A
detailedReviews.text: Seriously love this pizza. Probably my favorite in utah. Good price, great staff

detailedReviews.author: Renata Bianca Santos Porto de Araujo
√Çngela Suassuna
detailedReviews.text: Sempre frequentei esse lugar e adorooooooooooooooooo. Toda vez fico de deixar um review, tempo passa e nada. Ontem estive l√° para jantar uma pizza brasileira com alguns amigos e tudo maravilhoso. Pedimos 1/2 portuguesa e 1/2 frango com catupiry. SUPER RECOMENDO. Todo mundo experimentou o refrigerante Golly e super aprovado. Trouxe para casa mousse de maracuj√° e pudim e uma pizza para os meus filhos. Galera do shift de ontem Tabhita, Henrique, Leonardo, Mateus, Hercules e Lucas est√£o de parab√©ns.

detailedReviews.author: Larissa Bispo
detailedReviews.text: Frango c/ catupiry is heaven, thank you!

detailedReviews.author: L Newman
detailedReviews.text: My husband & I ordered the Brazilian pizzas: NY & Calebresa. It was divine! The catupiry cheese on the NY was so creamy, never tasted anything like it. Pizzas were packed with flavor and the crust was perfect! Their customer service was wonderful too.

detailedReviews.author: Jason Cluff
detailedReviews.text: Wasn‚Äôt the best pizza. For the price you pay.

detailedReviews.author: Lorenah Medinah
detailedReviews.text: Siempre me gusto ir a este lugar pero las 2 ultima vez que pedi me entregaron sin nada de queso y me dejo muy desilucionada , la primera vez pense que fue un error , pero 2 vezes lo mismo es muy raro!! Su personal me parece genial son amables pero si buscan cortar su presupuesto creo que el queso es lo ultimo que deberian quitar, porque la pizza sim queso no es pizza

detailedReviews.author: Mayara Barbosa
detailedReviews.text: The Chef was super attentive and available to answer questions about the menu. I loved the service and will definitely be back!!! Congratulations on the delicious meal and the chef who was super attentive and polite to us.

detailedReviews.author: Arthur Barbosa
detailedReviews.text: Very good atmosphere, food made on the spot by a highly qualified chef.

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Gibbs
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic food and excellent service! This is one of my favorite restaurants! Excellent quality all around! I highly recommend the Calabresa Pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Clyde Bess
detailedReviews.text: Very fun-loving team and friendly and helpful

detailedReviews.author: kleidy west
detailedReviews.text:
My favorite place  now!ü•∞
Super recomendo!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Angerbauer
detailedReviews.text: Great spot for pizza and especially their Calabresa Brazilian pizza! Leticia was our waitress and was great!

detailedReviews.author: Esme Toni
detailedReviews.text:
On January 24th around 6:30 PM, my friends and I visited your restaurant to celebrate a birthday. From the moment we entered, we were speaking in English‚Äîthis was clear to the staff, including the person who greeted us and the waiter who served us.

However, when our waiter approached us, the first thing they asked was, ‚ÄúDo you speak English?‚Äù This question was both unnecessary and disrespectful, especially considering that we had been conversing in English from the start. It made us feel unfairly judged, and we couldn‚Äôt help but wonder if this assumption was based on our appearance.

As a customer, I expect to be greeted with courtesy and professionalism, starting with a simple ‚ÄúHow are you?‚Äù or ‚ÄúCan I get you something to drink?‚Äù rather than a question that felt dismissive and offensive.

This experience left a very negative impression, and I wanted to bring it to your attention. I hope steps are taken to ensure your staff treats all guests with respect, regardless of their background.

detailedReviews.author: Ginger Harvey
detailedReviews.text: Henry was such a friendly server! This was a great experience! Will definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Dustin Ray
detailedReviews.text:
Let√≠cia provided awesome personal  service making our dining experience phenomenal!

Since we moved back to Utah from NY we struggle to find good New York style pizza anda you will find such at NY pizza patrol.

And to my great delight they also gave a great traditional brazilian menu to include Brazilian pizza with egg and green olives with pits amongst other great Brazilian favorites.

Only thing I wish they would add would be Coshinhas

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.1/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the authentic Brazilian flavors in dishes like the chicken stroganoff and p√£o de queijo, which satisfy specific cultural cravings. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and attentive service provided by staff members like Laticia and Pedro makes customers feel welcomed and valued. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The owner‚Äôs genuine concern and respectful handling of feedback, as well as the welcoming atmosphere, create a sense of community and trust. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues regarding food quality and service - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and poor service experiences - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness and inconsistent food quality - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Raul Ramirez
positive.text: Pretty good pizza little pricey but it was worth it in my opinion !

positive.author: Op Muh
positive.text: Amazing pasta! The Fettuccine Alfredo was awesome especially with the bread. The owner Leo, is a great guy and makes the whole place feel like home.

neutral.author: Valorie A
neutral.text: Very pleasant workers. The downfall was the price.

neutral.author: Trevr Smith
neutral.text: Service was top notch here. Unfortunately the pizza wasn't. Worse than Domino's.

neutral.author: Pamela Peterson
neutral.text: Changed ownership. Still excellent food, but no longer a foldable NY slice. Ive been a few times since the change and service each time has been just sad.

negative.author: jay johnson
negative.text: I stopped by last Friday (8/8/25) for lunch. Ordered a Cheese Calzone. Now I've eaten dozens and dozens of calzones in my life, including in NYC. What I was served was not a calzone, I have no idea what it was. When I cut it open, it vomited a creamy substance, that didn't deserve to be called cheese. It was uneatable. Check please. I'm still mad I actually paid for it because they might take that as an endorsement. Run away, I am not coming back.

negative.author: Jessica Pantages
negative.text: I used to purchase pizza here. Got a pizza last night. WHAT. THE. HELL. Did you run out of mozzarella?! What was the slapped on slices of cheese?!? White American cheese looks like same so it will be ok?!? Please don‚Äôt ever do this again. Yikes.

negative.author: Michele Murphy
negative.text: Come for the Brazilian pizza. We liked our pizza but the stroganoff was so bad which is hard to believe  because it‚Äôs not something too hard to make. The chicken was so soft but not in a good way. You could tell the quality was poor. Normally I would not leave a review like this but we were so disappointed and I‚Äôm hoping they will choose to use better quality meat. We have had the picanha in the best and that was a lot better too. The service was good though!!
